name: crises
description:
This is a mini kids game which is full of adventure and action...

 The main character of the game is NEWT,

He is a normal youth who don't know about his own abilities, he saves his town people  from trouble as a responsible guy... and i want to give a hint about my game that when monsters are undefeatable then use the money to upgrade the character..

i hope you will enjoy it ...

guys DOWNLOAD , PLAY , SHARE & COMMENT...
